Best movies I have ever watched so far

Last updated on August 21, 2023

As rating and criticizing a movie is not an easy task for a non-film critic, this list is just a compilation of the movies that I consider the best. It is not arranged in any particular order.

  • Inglourious Basterds (2009) [Quentin Tarantino]
  • Sorcerer (1977) [William Friedkin]
  • Casa Grande (2014) [Fellipe Barbosa]
  • Casino (1995) [Martin Scorsese]
  • Taxi Driver (1976) [Martin Scorsese]
  • Shutter Island (2010) [Martin Scorsese]
  • The Wolf of Wall Street (2013) [Martin Scorsese]
  • Fight Club (1999) [David Fincher]
  • Forrest Gump (1994) [Robert Zemeckis]
  • The Shawshank Redemption (1994) [Frank Darabont]
  • Schindler’s List (1993) [Steven Spielberg]
  • Saving Private Ryan (1998) [Steven Spielberg]
  • The Silence of the Lambs (1991) [Jonathan Demme]
  • Gladiator (2000) [Ridley Scott]
  • The Departed (2006) [Martin Scorsese]
  • A Beautiful Mind (2001) [Ron Howard]
  • Good Will Hunting (1997) [Gus Van Sant]
  • O Auto da Compadecida (2000) [Guel Arraes]
  • Catch Me If You Can (2002) [Steven Spielberg]
  • Cidade Baixa (2005) [Sergio Machado]
  • Pretty Woman (1990) [Garry Marshall]
  • Erin Brockovich (2000) [Steven Soderbergh]
  • L.A. Confidential (1997) [Curtis Hanson]
  • Heat (1995) [Michael Mann]
  • Collateral (2004) [Michael Mann]
  • Rain Man (1988) [Barry Levinson]
  • Ray (2004) [Taylor Hackford]
  • Malcolm X (1992) [Spike Lee]
  • Fences (2016) [Denzel Washington]
  • Flight (2012) [Robert Zemeckis]
  • Sully (2016) [Clint Eastwood]
  • Captain Phillips (2013) [Paul Greengrass]
  • American Sniper (2014) [Clint Eastwood]
  • Hacksaw Ridge (2016) [Mel Gibson]
  • Fury (2014) [David Ayer]
  • The Imitation Game (2014) [Morten Tyldum]
  • Cidade de Deus (2002) [Fernando Meirelles] and [Kária Lund]
  • Querô (2007) [Carlos Cortez]
  • Dunkirk (2017) [Christopher Nolan]
  • The Revenant (2015) [Alejandro G. Iñárritu]
  • The Great Gatsby (2013) [Baz Luhrmann]
  • The Theory of Everything (2014) [James Marsh]
  • The Boy in the Striped Pajamas (2008) [Mark Herman]
  • Bicho de Sete Cabeças (2000) [Laís Bodanzky]
  • The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008) [David Fincher]
  • Once Upon a Time in… Hollywood (2019) [Quentin Tarantino]
  • Apocalypto (2006) [Mel Gibson]
  • Apocalypse Now (1979) [Francis Ford Coppola]
  • Apollo 13 (1995) [Ron Howard]
  • 300 (2006) [Zack Snyder]
  • 7 Prisioneiros (2021) [Alexandre Moratto]
  • Pearl Harbor (2001) [Michael Bay]
  • Robin Hood (2010) [Ridley Scott]
  • Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World (2003) [Peter Weir]
  • Titanic (1997) [James Cameron]
  • Carandiru (2003) [Hector Babenco]
  • Sergio (2020) [Greg Barker]
  • Wasp Network (2019) [Olivier Assayas]
  • Richard Jewell (2019) [Clint Eastwood]
  • The Flowers of War (2011) [Yimou Zhang]
  • The Human Stain (2003) [Robert Benton]
  • The Long Walk Home (1990) [Richard Pearce]
  • A Time to Kill (1996) [Joel Schumacher]
  • Platoon (1986) [Oliver Stone]
  • Murder on the Orient Express (1974) [Sidney Lumet]
  • Dead Man Walking (1995) [Tim Robbins]
  • Capote (2005) [Bennett Miller]
  • The Pianist (2005) [Roman Polanski]
  • The Hunt (2012) [Thomas Vinterberg]
  • Sleepers (1996) [Barry Levinson]
  • Fracture (2007) [Gregory Hoblit]
  • Girl, Interrupted (1999) [James Mangold]
  • The Bone Collector (1999) [Phillip Noyce]
  • Vanilla Sky (2001) [Cameron Crowe]
  • Top Gun (1986) [Tony Scott]
  • Top Gun: Maverick (2022) [Joseph Kosinski]
  • The Big Short (2015) [Adam McKay]
  • Moneyball (2011) [Bennett Miller]
  • Legends of the Fall (1994) [Edward Zwick]
  • Primal Fear (1996) [Gregory Hoblit]
  • Hidden Figures (2016) [Theodore Melfi]
  • Léon: The Professional (1994) [Luc Besson]
